--- title: 01c Plotting Utils keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Handy functions for visualizing our datasets, complete with the vector fields we assign to them. Mostly builds off of matplotlib, with nicer syntax for using `.quiver`." description: "Handy functions for visualizing our datasets, complete with the vector fields we assign to them. Mostly builds off of matplotlib, with nicer syntax for using `.quiver`." nb_path: "01c Plotting Utils.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Pointset Plotting

Functions to visualize pointsets and manifolds with flow.

{% raw %}

plot_directed_2d[source]

plot_directed_2d(X, flows, labels=None, mask_prob=0.5, cmap='viridis', ax=None, save=False, title='', filename='')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

plot_origin_3d[source]

plot_origin_3d(ax, xlim, ylim, zlim)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

plot_directed_3d[source]

plot_directed_3d(X, flow, labels=None, mask_prob=0.5, cmap='viridis', origin=False, ax=None, save=False, filename='')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

For general 3d manifolds (like diffusion maps), this plot_3d function is handy.

{% raw %}

plot_3d[source]

plot_3d(X, distribution=None, title='', lim=None, use_plotly=False, colorbar=False, cmap='viridis')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Graph Plotting

Functions to visualize (small) graphs, directed and undirected.

{% raw %}

visualize_graph[source]

visualize_graph(data, is_networkx=False, to_undirected=False, ax=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

visualize_heatmap[source]

visualize_heatmap(edge_index, order_ind=None, cmap='copper', ax=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

We also make a version of visualize_heatmap that doesn't rely on torch geometric.

{% raw %}

visualize_edge_index[source]

visualize_edge_index(edge_index, order_ind=None, cmap='copper', ax=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Galary display

The following function takes a list of data generating functions and plot all of them to display a galary of datasets.

{% raw %}

display_galary[source]

display_galary(vizset, ncol=4)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

display_flow_galary(dataset, ncol=4)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

display_heatmap_galary(dataset, ncol=4)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
